entry.title: Friday: Showers or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of freezing rain or freezing drizzle beginning early this morning then changing to periods of drizzle this morning and ending later this morning. A few rain showers beginning late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High 8. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending early this evening then partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
